file_insights.primary_purpose: Add comprehensive TikTok Shop integration documentation

patterns_discovered.description: New TikTok Shop section mirrors existing agent documentation patterns with CLI examples, Python implementation, and feature descriptions
TikTokShopAgent follows the same API design as existing agents (BlogAgent, SocialAgent, AmazonAgent) with consistent method naming
Documentation includes both CLI command examples and Python code examples for each feature, maintaining parity with other platforms
Platform-specific guidelines added for TikTok Shop content strategy, consistent with existing platform recommendations
Directory structure documentation updated to reflect new tiktok-shop output folder alongside existing platforms

gotchas_discovered.description: TikTokShopAgent uses 'generate_product_title' and 'generate_product_description' while other agents use slightly different naming conventions - potential inconsistency in API design
CLI commands use 'tiktok' as the module identifier while other platforms use full names (amazon, social) - establishes precedent for abbreviated platform names
Video script generation includes duration_seconds parameter specific to TikTok's short-form format requirements - platform-specific constraint not present in other agents
TikTok Shop section is newly added while other platforms had existing implementation - this is documentation catch-up for an already-implemented feature

approach_outcome.methodology: Comprehensive documentation update following established patterns

completion_details.primary_objective: Document TikTok Shop integration for end-users

recommendations.recommendation: Review agent method naming conventions across all agents to ensure consistent naming patterns (e.g., generate_title vs generate_product_title)
recommendations.rationale: TikTokShopAgent introduces slightly different method naming that could cause confusion for users switching between platforms

recommendations.recommendation: Add table of contents or anchor links for easier navigation of the now-longer README
recommendations.rationale: With 56 new lines added, the README is becoming lengthy and users may benefit from quick navigation

recommendations.recommendation: Verify that all documented TikTok Shop methods are fully implemented in the actual agent code
recommendations.rationale: Documentation appears to be comprehensive, but implementation completeness should be confirmed

recommendations.recommendation: Consider adding platform-specific analytics or performance metrics guidance for TikTok Shop content
recommendations.rationale: Other platforms might benefit from similar metrics guidance; TikTok has unique engagement patterns worth highlighting
